import React, { useState } from 'react' import { register } from '../services/api' function Register() { const [form , setForm] = useState({ name : "", username : "", email : "", password : "" }) const handleInputChange =(e) => { setForm({...form , [e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const handleSubmt = async() => { const result = register(form) console.log(result) } return <>
Register An Account
} export default Register
